articles.title: Ancient wolf pup mummy unearthed in Canadian permafrost - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers think the 1.4-pound baby wolf died quickly after her den collapsed, possibly when her mother was out hunting. She was found in Yukon, northern Canada.
articles.content:
A mummified baby grey wolf with a perfectly preserved head, tail, paws and fur has been found in Yukon, northern Canada. 
The seven-week-old female wolf pup, christened Zhùr, had been locked in perm… [+5250 chars]
